content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to identify trees in Michigan via Google search. I found several resources, including a PDF guide from Michigan State University Extension, but encountered an error 404 when commanded to download it. Recently, I was commanded to browse the MSU Extension website for the PDF guide and learned that it can be downloaded by clicking on the "DOWNLOAD FILE" link provided in the text. I then attempted to download the PDF guide using the shell command "wget," but encountered an error due to too much output. After using the command "list_files," I found that the file "Trees_of_MI.pdf" was successfully downloaded. \n\nMy latest action was to receive a command to read the downloaded file "Trees_of_MI.pdf," but my computer returned an error: "NoneType" object has no attribute "encoding." No other new developments have occurred.'}
"""
